content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-85 to -87)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), (37.0,-85.0)
- Storage chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), (36.5,-86.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Storage chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (-6.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-56.5), (-5.5,-56.5), (-4.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting the mining drills

### Iron/Copper Processing at position(x=-28 to -20, y=-61 to -55)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0)
- Storage chests at (-27.5,-59.5), (-24.5,-58.5), (-22.5,-55.5)
- Stone furnaces at (-27.0,-58.0), (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0)
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5), (-20.5,-59.5), (-22.5,-56.5)

### Smelting Complex at position(x=0 to 8, y=0 to 4)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Storage chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5), (8.5,0.5), (8.5,4.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for input/output
- Transport belt system for item movement

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3 to 4, y=17 to 27)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric poles forming electricity network

# ERROR TIPS

### Extraction errors
- Cannot extract more items than available in the source container
- Ensure target container has sufficient capacity before extracting

### Transport belt issues
- Clear blocked transport belts at positions (2.5,4.5), (4.5,4.5), and (6.5,4.5)
- Ensure belts have space available before inserters attempt to place items

### Power system warnings
- Boiler needs fuel to operate
- Steam engine requires proper fluid connections to function
- Ensure consistent water supply through pipe network

### Inserter operation issues
- Multiple inserters waiting for source items - ensure steady material supply
- Some inserters blocked by items on ground - clear blockages and ensure proper output paths
